title: Selective perfluorooctanoic acid (PFOA) and perfluorooctane sulfonate (PFOS) adsorption by nanoscale zero-valent iron (nZVI): performance and mechanisms
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,1915-1925
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00987D, Paper
Junhua Fang, Kairan Xu, Airong Liu, Yinghao Xue, Luna Tie, Zilong Deng, Rongliang Qiu, Wei-xian Zhang
This study investigated the adsorption of PFOA and PFOS by nanoscale zero-valent iron, revealing the adsorption mechanism and enriching the understanding of environmental remediation.
